You hear, and read these stories about illness, death, and lack of healthcare for our citizens, and you become overwhelmed with heartache. I can't for the life of me understand how people in power can hear these same type of stories daily, and continue to fight against healthcare for all. I can't even imagine the level of frustration that Senator Sanders goes through.

what is happening at the refuge...besides some people camping in the cold? People take guns on public land all the time when they're camping... Are you saying the bad words have caused you injury? How? Did you go there, knowing what was going on? How, exactly, are they not being peaceful? They have met with law enforcement, the media, the towns people..no one has been killed..no commerce has been held up. Whereas, the bridge hangers actually endagered themselves, shut down car traffic and river traffic...????
